Title: Community Tools for Analysis of NASA Earth Observation System Data in the Cloud
In Memoriam: Dr. Roger Barry (1935 - 2018)
Description: The cryosphere expert and University of Colorado Distinguished Professor of Geography was the founding director of the National Snow and Ice Data Center (NSIDC).

Title: New Vegetation Indices and Surface Reflectance Products Available from LANCE
Description: LANCE has started generating NRT daily 8-day rolling datasets following requests from the dust modeling and agricultural monitoring communities.

Title: A Unified and Coherent Land Surface Temperature and Emissivity (LST&E) Earth System Data Record (ESDR) for Earth Science
Distant Fields of Grain
Description: Remote estimates of crop yields help international aid agencies decide how to act.

Title: A Catalog of Change
Description: Researchers assemble a picture of climate change impacts around the world.

Title: User Profile: Dr. Priscila Kienteca Lange
Description: Life on Earth would not be possible without the help of phytoplankton. Dr. Priscila Kienteca Lange uses NASA ocean biology data to study the biomass and distribution of these microscopic organisms.

Title: EOSDIS Acronym and Symbol List
Description: Acronym and symbol list for NASA's Earth Observing System Data and Information System.

Title: Zebras Without Borders
Description: A new generation reconnects with greener pastures.

Title: Connecting Rainfall and Landslides
Description: Scientists use satellites to plot heavy rainfall and help assess landslide and flood hazards.
